game

Class Town

  • java.lang.Object
    • game.Town

  • public class Town
extends java.lang.Object
    The Town, managing the game. The town represents the whole game. The Players are saved in an array and all their actions will be called here. Will call nighttime-actions and daytime-actions in a strict order in a loop, until the game ends. Games end, if any fraction (Humanity or Werwolves) eliminates the other.

    • Method Detail

      • createPlayer

        public TablePlayer createPlayer(java.lang.String name,
                                int role)
        Creates a Player. Based on input, the created Player will be instance of a subclass of Player.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Player
        role - The role of the Player
        Returns:
        The created Player.

      • createGameData

        public GameData createGameData()
        Creates a package of information that contains current state of this Town
        Returns:
        created GameDate object

      • init

        public void init(java.lang.String[] data)
        Initiates a Game. Creates a Player-array from a list of name and randomly chooses the roles of Players
        Parameters:
        data - : String array that contains name of players

      • printPlayers

        public void printPlayers()
        The state of the Town. Outputs every Player in the Town and their Status.

      • killVotedPlayer

        public void killVotedPlayer()
        Kills the Player with the most votes. The Player with the most votes will die. Will be called every day after voting.

      • detectVotedPlayer

        public void detectVotedPlayer()
        Detect the Player with the most votes. The Player with the most votes will die. Will be called every night after the Werewolf-actions.

      • countAlivePlayers

        private int countAlivePlayers()
        Counts the amount of Players alive. If there are 0 Players alive, the Game will end as a win for Werwolves.

      • checkSituation

        public boolean checkSituation()
        Evaluates the situation. Werwolves win, if there is no Human alive left. Humanity wins, if there is no Werewolf and at least 1 Human alive left.

        public void handleSeerDone()

      • handleVote

        public void handleVote(java.lang.String vote,
                       java.lang.String victim)
        Handle the vote from player. Raise the amount of vote by victim and marks the vote player as voted
        Parameters:
        vote - : The player that do this vote action
        victim - : The player that will be voted
